```{r,include = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(ISLR)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(mosaic)
library(manipulate)
```


```{r,message=FALSE}
conversion_data <-read.csv("/Users/Priscilla/Desktop/SMITH/2016 Fall/uGrid/Proj_1/conversion_data.csv")
conversion_data %>%
  slice(1:10)
```

```{r}
str(conversion_data)
dim(conversion_data)
names(conversion_data)
```

`new_urser` and `converted` were shown as numerical variables, but they are categorical variables, so we need to convert them.
```{r}
summary(conversion_data)
conversion_data <- conversion_data %>%
  mutate(new_user = factor(new_user)) %>%
  mutate(converted = factor(converted))
summary(conversion_data)
```
